articles.title: JetBlue Airline boss over-hiring to beat staff exodus
articles.description: Low-fare carrier JetBlue said it is a necessary policy when recruiting, as the industry re-starts.
articles.content:
The boss of US low-fare carrier JetBlue has said it is necessary to over-hire staff because of the rate at which people are still leaving the industry.
Robin Hayes was speaking as thousands of trave… [+3219 chars]

articles.title: Commonwealth Games: India beat England in Twenty20 semi-final
articles.description: England's hopes of winning Twenty20 gold are over after they fall to a four-run defeat by India in the semi-finals of the Commonwealth Games.
articles.content:
Twenty20 semi-final: Edgbaston
India 164-5 (20 overs) beat England 160-6 (20 overs) by four runs
Scorecard

articles.title: Commonwealth Games: England's James Willstrop and Declan James win men's doubles squash gold
articles.description: James Willstrop and Declan James beat fellow England pair Daryl Selby and Adrian Waller in men's squash doubles final.
articles.content:
James Willstrop and Declan James added a Commonwealth Games gold to the world title they won in April
